title: Telling Time: Schedules (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Schedules subcategory within Telling Time. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.japanese: 六時半から朝ご飯です。

cards.english: I will meet my friend at seven thirty.
cards.romaji: Shichi-ji sanjuppun ni tomodachi ni aimasu.
cards.japanese: 七時三十分友達に会います。
